cutaway.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a cutaway model, drawing etc is open on one side so that you can see the details inside it
cutaway.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a short part of a television programme or a film that shows something different from the main action, for example an image of someone listening to a person who is talking
cutaway.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: As he continued with his speech, cutaways showed the audience looking bored.
